translation.landing_page.greeting: Hi! My name is Alejandro Aponte
translation.landing_page.description_1: I've worked as Machine Learning Engineer and software engineer the last two years, my passion is create AI-based applications.
translation.landing_page.description_2: My interests include computer vision, natural language processing, computer science, and software design and development.
translation.landing_page.description_3: When I work with an AI challenge, I approach it with curiosity and confidence, always eager to push the boundaries of what's achievable.
translation.landing_page.skills_section_description_: I've worked appling visual effects to images, performing object detection and manipulation, and image compression
I've worked in proyects of text clustering, text summatization and information retrival. I'm experienced in regex for performant operations
Find patterns in data and visualizate them in different systems
I've had experience in MySQL, Postgres, SQLServer and Bigquery for data manipulation and database design
I know advance management of APIs for large and scalable applications
One of my core strengths is my ability to integrate different systems from database to user view
I've worked with AWS services for train ML models, store files and information, deploy APIs on microservices or serverless and many more
Over the last years, I've built database, backend and frontend systems and made the integratation between them
I know about 3D dynamics, texture, material and illumination handling, as well as familiarity developing human-computer interactions
